name: Gorilla Galore
description:
Gorilla Galore tells the story of Milo, a teenager in present time who plays video games to kill time. On the night of his birthday, much to his dismay, his father William gifts him one of the oldest gaming consoles to date, the NT-4, along with his old tv and a game that comes with the package called Gorilla Galore.  The next thing he knows,  Milo is transported to the world of the retro game Gorilla Galore via the portal that is the old TV his father gifted him. Join Milo in his shenanigans to beat the game and return home!

This game was made as a submission to the Joints Game Jam.

Controls

W = Move Up

A = Move Left

S = Move Down

D = Move Right

Space = Character skill

Credits GUI

PX UI - Basic by Karwisch

Backgrounds

House (night) and House (day) by 彩 雅介@きまぐれアフター 

Bedroom by LisadiKaprio

BGM & SFX

WAV Royalty Free Music Pack Volume 2 by Tim Beek:

Landing Page

8-bit Adventure

Dog Town

Door Creaking Sound by K F

Glowing Sound Effect by Funky Sounds Production

Cassette Insert/Sound Effect by Technical S.P.

TV Static Noise Sound Effect by Alesjo Llazari

8-Bit Coin Sound Effect by Creator Assets

8-BIT Sound Effects by B Gamer

The Team Chicken N' Cheese
